trans-unit.source: The PowerShellTabCollection Object
trans-unit.target: The PowerShellTabCollection Object

trans-unit.source: powershell,cmdlet
trans-unit.target: powershell,cmdlet

trans-unit.source: The PowerShellTabCollection Object
trans-unit.target: The PowerShellTabCollection Object

trans-unit.source: The **PowerShellTab** collection object is a collection of **PowerShellTab** objects.
trans-unit.target: The **PowerShellTab** collection object is a collection of **PowerShellTab** objects.

trans-unit.source: Each **PowerShellTab** object functions as a separate runtime environment.
trans-unit.target: Each **PowerShellTab** object functions as a separate runtime environment.

trans-unit.source: It is an instance of Microsoft.PowerShell.Host.ISE.PowerShellTabs class.
trans-unit.target: It is an instance of Microsoft.PowerShell.Host.ISE.PowerShellTabs class.

trans-unit.source: An example is the **$psISE.PowerShellTabs** object.
trans-unit.target: An example is the **$psISE.PowerShellTabs** object.

trans-unit.source: Methods
trans-unit.target: Methods

trans-unit.source: Add\(\)
trans-unit.target: Add\(\)

trans-unit.source: Supported in Windows PowerShell ISE 2.0 and later.
trans-unit.target: Supported in Windows PowerShell ISE 2.0 and later.

trans-unit.source: Adds a new PowerShell tab to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Adds a new PowerShell tab to the collection.

trans-unit.source: It returns the newly added tab.
trans-unit.target: It returns the newly added tab.

trans-unit.source: Remove\(Microsoft.PowerShell.Host.ISE.PowerShellTab psTab\)
trans-unit.target: Remove\(Microsoft.PowerShell.Host.ISE.PowerShellTab psTab\)

trans-unit.source: Supported in Windows PowerShell ISE 2.0 and later.
trans-unit.target: Supported in Windows PowerShell ISE 2.0 and later.

trans-unit.source: Removes the tab that is specified by the **psTab** parameter.
trans-unit.target: Removes the tab that is specified by the **psTab** parameter.

trans-unit.source: **psTab** The PowerShell tab to remove.
trans-unit.target: **psTab** The PowerShell tab to remove.

trans-unit.source: SetSelectedPowerShellTab\(Microsoft.PowerShell.Host.ISE.PowerShellTab psTab\)
trans-unit.target: SetSelectedPowerShellTab\(Microsoft.PowerShell.Host.ISE.PowerShellTab psTab\)

trans-unit.source: Supported in Windows PowerShell ISE 2.0 and later.
trans-unit.target: Supported in Windows PowerShell ISE 2.0 and later.

trans-unit.source: Selects the PowerShell tab that is specified by the **psTab** parameter to make it the currently active PowerShell tab.
trans-unit.target: Selects the PowerShell tab that is specified by the **psTab** parameter to make it the currently active PowerShell tab.

trans-unit.source: **psTab** The PowerShell tab to select.
trans-unit.target: **psTab** The PowerShell tab to select.

trans-unit.target: See Also
